name: Advanced Kurdish Keyboard
description: Advanced Kurdish Keyboard allows writing Kurdish language in Sorani and Kurmanji variants.This Keyboard is designed to have a complete set of Kurdish letters and punctuations.To users who would like mix Arabic along with kurdish letters , there is a dedicated Arabic layout. It also includes Half-Space function key and multiple variants of He letters and, special designed for Sorani dialect. A wide range of emoji and math operators for scientific community.  Easy wizard-installation Changing language is easier than ever, by just swiping keyboard! or tapping on Language Key..... Advanced Kurdish Keyboard is a compact keyboard with minimum size (around 4 MB) and high performance
